item.title: ‘The Shards’ a Go at FX; Ryan Murphy Series Based on Bret Easton Ellis Novel Casts Three Leads
item.description: Igby Rigney, Homer Gere and Graham Campbell are set to star in the drama.

item.title: Brie Larson Joins Olivia Colman in ‘Cry Wolf’ Limited Series at FX
